title: (x) BREATHLESS Godard Font ID - modified Aurora Bold Condensed {Nick Curtis}
content:
Really enjoying this typeface. Anybody know if its custom or if there is something similar out there?

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130827155653im_/http:/typophile.com/files/breathless_4015.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [breathless.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130827155653/http:/typophile.com/files/breathless.jpg) | 140.43 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content: Putting a rounded stroke on [Aurora Bold Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20130827155653/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/aurora/bold-condensed/) oughta do it...

Yup. Came up [before](http://web.archive.org/web/20130827155653/http:/typophile.com/node/37443) (and [before](http://web.archive.org/web/20130827155653/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38524)). Answer and answerer stay the same … ;-)  
F
